title: Liam O'Brien
body: Plz give us more champions with him voice acting. We will beg for it... Probably

replies.body:
I could say the same about Tara Platt.

but his voice sure is sexy
I haven't heard/seen this guy in years, not to mention I don't even know what he sounds like.

> [{quoted}](name=mutley,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Ft8OuQTy,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-10-04T03:56:27.360+0000)
>
> I haven't heard/seen this guy in years, not to mention I don't even know what he sounds like.

He is the guy responsible for Yasuo's voice in this game.

Other than that, he is involved in a shiet ton of anime English dubs, as well as being the voice behind Asura in the game Asura's Wrath (it is one of the few instances where the English voice acting actually surpasses the Japanese one).

This guy as a voice actor, is pretty darn good.
"Who says I can't handle my drinks."
What, does it give you a boner? Does it help you get off? Who the fuck are you kid, expecting people to listen?
Diana may have swag. But you most certainly don't
